title: Shopkeepers插件输入指令出现错误 1.6.4服务器
author: y2744746966
txt_content: 我对着地面输入指令 出现错误 An internal error occurred while attempting to perform this command   中文意思是：在试图执行此命令时发生了一个内部错误     我对着半空中输入却显示  You cannot create a shopkeeper there  中文意思

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
An internal error occurred while attempting to perform this command 意思是插件加载不了，出现错误，你可以试试安装别的jar。

You cannot create a shopkeeper there 意思是你不可以在这里创造一个村民。必须是实体的，空气里面不可以

replies.author: y2744746966
replies.txt_content:
lichi2050 发表于 2015-3-29 20:48
An internal error occurred while attempting to perform this command 意思是插件加载不了，出现错误，你 ...
谢谢了！我回去让服主试一试，采纳了
